We shut him down, we get our city back.
translation.ja: そいつを捕まえ 街を取り戻す

translation.en: Who is he?
He's your get-out-of-jail-free card.
[woman] You okay, honey?
translation.ja: 〝男が走って パトカーを振り切る〞 〝男が走って パトカーを振り切る〞 どう？

translation.en: -You need anything else? -[man] No, I'm fine.
translation.ja: 他に注文は？ いや 俺はいい

translation.en: Hmm. Yes, you are.
So, can I get you anything?
You got any hot water?
translation.ja: じゃあ お湯をもらえるかな

translation.en: -I'll take some of that. -Yeah. Okay, I'll get that for you.
translation.ja: じゃあ お湯をもらえるかな いいわよ

translation.en: Jessica! Can I get some hot water?
translation.ja: ジェシカ お湯をお願い

translation.en: [Robin] Newt, you in there?
Newt.
Seriously?
Say, you saw who did this?
No, I just came out the door.
[Robin's voice] It's Robin. You know what to do.
Hey, it's me.
I need to re-up, so meet me in the usual spot.
translation.ja: 補充したい いつもの場所で会おう

translation.en: [Robin] Let me out! Please, let me out!
translation.ja: 出して お願い 出してよ

translation.en: You keep kicking around in there.
This how we gonna do this.
All that kicking ain't making no sense.
[Robin] Somebody help!
You in a strange man's car in an even stranger place.
translation.ja: こんな場所じゃ 誰も気付かない

translation.en: [Robin shrieks] Help!
Help, please!
But I need to have a conversation with you.
-I need to be able to look-- -[Robin screams]
I need to be able to look you in your eye.
translation.ja: 君の目を見て話したいんだ

translation.en: [man] You don't wanna calm down,
maybe I need to make a trip over to 32 Park, right?
translation.ja: パーク通り32を 訪ねてもいいのか？

translation.en: You know where 32 Park is?
Well, if I let you out and you start crying,
I'ma pay a little visit to Irene.
Make sure she all right, huh?
translation.ja: 無事を確かめないとな

translation.en: I take it you love Irene 'cause you ain't knocking no more.
translation.ja: 彼女のために 蹴るのをやめたな

translation.en: So when I open this up,
I want my conversation.
[man] Why don't we start from the beginning, make it simple? What's your name?
translation.ja: 最初からやり直そう 名前は？

translation.en: -Huh? -I'm Robin!
Oh, I can't hear you.
-What is it? -[crying] Robin.
Robin.
You push that Power, don't you?
I don't know nothing about that--
-You don't know? -No! I don't!
Maybe you'll figure it out, huh? You stay in there until you figure it out.
translation.ja: 思い出すまで中にいるか？

translation.en: [Robin] I don't know!
What's the source?
-I don't know. -You don't know?
-Maybe you know something about Newt. -I don't-- I don't know--
translation.ja: ニュートは？ 知らないってば

translation.en: -Oh, you don't know who Newt is? -No.
[man] That's funny because Newt be all in your phone.
I get weird texts from people all the time because that's what the job is.
translation.ja: 仕事のせいで よく他人からメールが来る

translation.en: Well, let me tell you what's even more weird. -Newt ain't here no more. -What?
translation.ja: いいか ニュートはもういない

translation.en: So since Newt ain't here, that leads us to... where to, huh?
translation.ja: 彼がいない場合は 誰に連絡を？

translation.en: Where to, Robin? I need to know where the source is.
translation.ja: ロビン 供給元を教えろ

translation.en: [Robin sobbing] I don't-- Believe me!
-I said get out! -[sobbing]
[screams] Why?
So you can advance your position in life.
Who is that?
-Hmm? Look closer, is that Biggie? -I don't know.
translation.ja: ビギーか？ 知らない

translation.en: -You don't know? -No, I don't know.
Oh, you on these streets, you don't know shit.
translation.ja: 売人のくせに知らないのか

translation.en: I know you're scared.
I know you're feeling like fight or flight, but I'ma tell you right now, you just breathe and get through it
translation.ja: ストレス反応だ だが落ち着いてくれ

translation.en: because listen, you don't know who I am and what I'm about,
translation.ja: 俺が何者かは関係ない

translation.en: but I got to find that source.
translation.ja: とにかく供給元を知りたい

translation.en: I need to get to the top of the food chain.
But you keep messing around with me and acting like you don't know shit,
translation.ja: 知らないフリを続ける気なら

translation.en: I'm gonna knock your ass out, and then I'm gonna go kill your mother.
translation.ja: 君を痛い目に遭わせて ママを殺す

translation.en: I'ma kill Irene.
Look me in my eyes.
Am I lying?
So tell me your decision.
translation.ja: さあ 聞かせてもらおう

translation.en: [man] There's our buyer.
[woman] You trust her?
She's connected to every cartel in South America.
translation.ja: 南米の全組織とつながってる

translation.en: She's the real deal.
And the money?
You'll get it.
Then our backers will see what the rest of us have already seen.
translation.ja: 支援者も 俺たちの理念に賛同する

translation.en: What's that?
That we're working for the woman who's gonna change the world.
translation.ja: “世界を変える女性に 仕える”

translation.en: Welcome. I see you packed light.
translation.ja: ようこそ 荷物が少ないようだ

translation.en: I was expecting...
duffel bags.
The money is here...
if the product lives up to its reputation.
translation.ja: 商品がウワサどおりならね

translation.en: Product?
It is not just a product.
These pills will topple governments.
You're about to become the most powerful woman in South America.
translation.ja: あなたは 南米一の権力者になれる

translation.en: In that case, I look forward to your demonstration.
translation.ja: そう　実演会が楽しみだわ

translation.en: Hey, I see what you doin'.
Give me this.
You do what I told you.
No messing around.
[man] Operator.
[Robin] Hi.
I was told to call this number if I ever had a problem.
translation.ja: “問題があれば この番号にかけろ”と

translation.en: [man] Go to Hong Kong Market off of Patterson.
translation.ja: ホンコン･マーケットに行け

translation.en: Go to the back and ask for alligator wine.
translation.ja: 店の奥でワニのワインを頼め

translation.en: Come alone.
-[Robin] Okay. -[phone beeps]
[man] You're gonna go meet whoever's in there,
you're gonna tell them what we talked about.
translation.ja: 指示したとおりに話せ 〝ホンコン･マーケット〞

translation.en: You're gonna tell them that you saw me and that I left.
translation.ja: 俺を見かけたが 消えたと伝えろ

translation.en: -No-- -And if they ask...
No, you said point you in a direction, that's a direction.
translation.ja: 場所を教えるだけの約束よ

translation.en: You ever hear of a mine rat?
-It sound like a rat that get blown up. -Well, that's what you are.
translation.ja: 自爆するネズミ？ それが君だ

translation.en: You're my mine rat.
Look, I was just trying to make ends meet. I'm just a kid, I'm--
translation.ja: 生活のためよ まだ子供だし…

translation.en: I know what you trying to do!
You out here in these streets dealing, you ain't no damn kid.
translation.ja: 君は売人だ もう子供じゃない

translation.en: You gave that up.
You can't keep playing that whole "I'm just a child" card, okay?
translation.ja: “まだ子供”なんて言い訳は 通用しない

translation.en: Let's make it happen.
Yes, sir.
-[Robin] Excuse me. -[phone keys tapping]
Excuse me.
Alligator wine?
That's not a thing.
Can you just ask somebody?
[woman] He said wait here.
Excuse me, could you help me out with this?
What?
-Is it spicy, is it mild? -I don't know what the fuck it is.
I don't work here.
Watch your step.
Okay, why don't you have a seat?
How'd you get the number?
Newt gave it to me.
[man] You're a dealer.
Yeah, he gave it to me in case something went wrong.
translation.ja: 問題があれば連絡しろって

translation.en: [man] Newt's dead.
[Robin] I know.
How'd that happen?
There's this guy.
He calls himself "The Major."
He killed him. Then he threw me in his trunk.
translation.ja: ニュートを殺し 私を拉致した

translation.en: He's right outside.
Can I go?
You should stay right here.
This is the safest place for you right now.
You Biggie?
I'm not Biggie. Biggie works in sales. This is distribution.
translation.ja: 違う　彼は販売担当 ここは流通部門で…

translation.en: -Talk to me. -[man] Listen, I can...
I don't want to talk to any middle men. Already did that.
You don't tell me where Biggie is, I'll cut your fucking head off.
translation.ja: 居場所を言わないと殺すぞ

translation.en: Start the truck!
[Robin screams] Let me out!
Hey!
[man] Hey, Robin!
You still in there?
-You all right? -[Robin] Yeah. Yeah.
Don't worry, okay? I'm gonna come--
[whispers] Everything's okay.
Tracy.
Baby.
It's so good to see you.
What? What?
Cover your ears.
What's that?
They're logging Powers. There's chips in every capsule.
translation.ja: ピルにチップを仕込み 追跡してる

translation.en: The government won't let them test it, so they test it on us.
translation.ja: 政府の許可が下りず 勝手に実験を

translation.en: The people that you're selling to,
they're the lab rats.
-[beeping] -[Robin] What's all that?
translation.ja: これは？ これは？ 〝今夜：実演会〞 〝今夜：実演会〞

translation.en: [man] It's a demonstration for potential buyers.
translation.ja: 顧客候補への実演だ 〝今夜：実演会〞 顧客候補への実演だ

translation.en: It means they're done with New Orleans. It means I'm running out of time.
translation.ja: この街を離れる気だな 時間がない

translation.en: -I gotta go there. -[tone sounding]
You gotta take me there.
Tracy, take...
[Robin screams] Help!
Help!
Help!
[man] Robin, I need...
Please.
You killed my cousin.
He ODed. I didn't kill him.
translation.ja: 違う　過剰摂取で死んだ

translation.en: I got money.
Please.
I'm just trying-- I'm just trying to find my daughter.
translation.ja: 娘を見つけたいだけなんだ

translation.en: Yo, chill.
Yo, you need to calm down.
You fell out, I brought you to the vet. My mom work here.
translation.ja: 動物病院よ　ママの職場なの

translation.en: You did this?
Yeah.
But now I need to finish the exit wound.
You gonna let me do it or not?
I guess that's a yes.
Wait, wait, wait.
What?
Y'all work on humans?
Nope.
I didn't even do nothing yet.
[woman] There a lot of girls that look just like her!
[man] Mrs. Reilly, do you want your daughter to end up dead?
translation.ja: 娘さんが死んでもいいのか？

translation.en: I already told you, I don't know where she is.
translation.ja: どこにいるか知らない

translation.en: She was supposed to be home hours ago. What...

translation.en: With all due respect, officer, there's a lot of girls--
translation.ja: 刑事さん うちの子じゃ…

translation.en: [man] This could get very ugly for your daughter
translation.ja: どうなってもいいのか

translation.en: -and for you. -[woman] Are you sure it was her?
Are you sure you're not mistaken?
[man] Are you sure you haven't seen this man before?
translation.ja: 本当に男を知らないのか

translation.en: [woman] No, I told you I don't know what you talking about.
translation.ja: 知らないし 何の話だか…

translation.en: [man] That's funny.
We have surveillance footage of your daughter with this man tonight
translation.ja: お宅の娘とこの男は 店で犯罪を犯した

translation.en: committing crimes about five miles from here.
translation.ja: 監視カメラに映ってる

translation.en: Are you sure?
This could get a whole lot uglier for you.
translation.ja: あんたもマズい状況だぞ

translation.en: Honey, bear. Are we all out of that one hippie shampoo that--
translation.ja: ハニー シャンプーはどこに…

translation.en: Whoa! What the shit's going on here? Who the hell are you guys?
What you doing in my bathroom?
-[man] We're the police. Who are you? -Man, I live here.
translation.ja: 警察だ　君は？ 住人だ

translation.en: Babe, I'm sorry I was in your shower. The pressure's so much better in yours.
translation.ja: ごめんよ 俺の浴室は水圧が弱くて…

translation.en: Can you come over here?
I'm really sorry it had to happen that way.
Robin sent me.
Let me just handle these guys, okay?
Officers.
What precinct did you guys say you're from?
They didn't say.
Sir, Mrs. Reilly and her daughter seem to be the only residents registered to this address.
translation.ja: この住所の住人は ライリー夫人と娘さんだけだ

translation.en: I see.
So now because I'm not in your little database, I can't...
translation.ja: データベースに 登録がないからって…

translation.en: -[sneezes] -Bless you.
-[sneezes] -Is there a cat in here?
I thought you said you lived here.
-[cat meows] -Yes, I do, sir.
Is that so hard to believe? Why?
translation.ja: 信じられない？　なぜ？

translation.en: Is it because I'm white?
Are you assuming that me and this beautiful Black woman wouldn't be able to share a happy home?
translation.ja: 黒人女性と 同居してるはずがないと？

translation.en: You wanna say that on camera?
-Babe, where's your phone? -Got it.
All right. Well, let's just see about this.
-And we are live streaming. -[phone beeps] Now, let's just get this on record.
translation.ja: ライブ配信して証拠を残す

translation.en: Honey, did either of these men show you a warrant when they came into our house?
translation.ja: ハニー ２人は家に入る前 令状を見せたか？

translation.en: No, they did not.
Uh-huh. And did either of them show you a badge?
No! Can I see your badges?
Gentlemen.
Thank you for your time, Mrs. Reilly.
[woman] I'm sorry, do I know you?
You got any duct tape?
Duct tape? What?
Stop! Who are you?
My name is Detective Frank Shaver, NOPD.
Can I see your badge?
Well, I don't have it on me.
Where do you have it?
Mrs. Reilly, your daughter and I have had a professional friendship for a little over half a year now.
translation.ja: 娘さんには半年ほど前から 協力してもらってる

translation.en: She's a very smart and good-hearted young person, but she is mixed up in some things she shouldn't be,
translation.ja: 頭がよくて いい子だが 面倒に巻き込まれてる

translation.en: and I am trying to help her.
Thank you. I'm gonna need this too.
Where's yours?
[man] So what's your power?
I don't even know.
Come on. You ain't tried it?
Honestly...
I saw a girl OD.
You know, on the streets, they're talking about how it'll give you superpowers,
translation.ja: 売人は“超人に なれる”って言うだけ

translation.en: but not about how one hit could kill you.
Yeah.
Well, if you’re so spooked,
why you still in the game?
What happened to getting good grades and staying in school?
translation.ja: 勉強して いい成績を取るべきだろ

translation.en: Yo, I wish I could get good grades.
translation.ja: 私だって そうしたい

translation.en: Go to school, get to college, get some fancy-ass job.
translation.ja: 大学に行って いい仕事に就きたいけど

translation.en: But I need money now.
Everybody need money now.
Well, my mother has diabetes now.
And we don't got no health insurance. And she needs surgery, the expensive kind, so what else am I supposed to do?
translation.ja: 医療保険に入ってないし 他に手術代を稼ぐ方法が？

translation.en: Oh, that's easy.
-What? -Go to the Army.
-What, it don't trip you up killing fools? -Yeah, it tripped me up.
translation.ja: 殺人マシンにされる 確かにな

translation.en: But that was my skill set.
And what did the system do? It took advantage of me.
translation.ja: そして権力に利用された

translation.en: But I know now I got to work the system harder than it's working me.
translation.ja: だから つけ込まれる前に こっちが利用しろ

translation.en: That's what you gotta do.
You're young, you're Black, you're a woman.
translation.ja: 君は若いし 黒人で女だ

translation.en: The system is designed to swallow you whole.
translation.ja: この社会のシステムに 飲み込まれてしまう

translation.en: You gotta find out what you do better than anybody else and rock that.
translation.ja: 誰にも負けない特技を 生かすことだ

translation.en: So what you gonna do? Hmm?
How you gonna leave your mark?
I rap.
I'm sorry. Well, what's your rap name then, huh?
translation.ja: 悪かった　ラップ名は？

translation.en: What you gonna be, the next Cardi B?
Huh? Cardi C?
Well, go ahead and spit then.
You say you rap, let me hear one line.
Huh? You can't spit one line?
I don't like doing it in front of people.
How you gonna to be a rapper if you got stage fright?
translation.ja: じゃあラッパーは無理だろ

translation.en: You know what I think? Most time, people don't wanna do something
translation.ja: 披露したがらないのは

translation.en: is 'cause they're probably just wack at it.
If you wack, just say you wack.
Fine, give me a word.
Give you a word? What you talking about?
[Robin] I'm gonna go off the top, give me a word.
translation.ja: 即興でやる　選んで

translation.en: Oh, you that good, huh?
Feline.
Feline.
♪ I'm 'bout to make a beeline ♪
translation.ja: つかめ 最短コース(ビーライン)

translation.en: ♪ And every single accolade for spitting 'Bout to be mine ♪
translation.ja: ラップの称賛　全て私のもの(ビーマイン)

translation.en: ♪ I'ma go from old shit and goodwill To design ♪
translation.ja: 説教 善意 蹴散らし 　　たどり着くデザイン

translation.en: ♪ I'ma be rocking Dior like Dion I'm Celine ♪
translation.ja: ディオール似合う 　　　　私はディオン シーライン 　　ていうかセリーヌ

translation.en: ♪ Or maybe I meant Céline ♪
translation.ja: シーライン 　　ていうかセリーヌ

translation.en: ♪ I'm feeling really cuh-lean ♪
♪ Can someone tell them other boys A real MC is coming, no humming ♪
translation.ja: 本物のＭＣ誕生(カミング) 　　文句(ハミング)言うなよ 男ども

translation.en: ♪ My name already chose a different bird ♪
translation.ja: 名を上げたのはこの女(バード)

translation.en: ♪ I killed your lil freestyle Give me another word ♪
translation.ja: あんたの負け　次のお題(ワード)は？

translation.en: Give me another word.
Seismograph.
translation.ja: 地震計(サイズモグラフ)

translation.en: ♪ Dude trying to trip me up With his seismograph ♪
translation.ja: サイズモグラフで私を洗脳？

translation.en: ♪ I think it's funny I can't pick a better time to laugh ♪
translation.ja: バカな話　マジで笑える(ラフ)

translation.en: ♪ I'll find the path ♪
♪ You don't know all the rhymes I have ♪ ♪ The only thing that don't sit well Within this mind ♪ ♪ Is math ♪
translation.ja: ライムが詰まった頭 　　だから要らない 数学(マス)は

translation.en: Antibiotic.
translation.ja: 抗生物質(アンチバイオティック)

translation.en: Antibiotic.
translation.ja: アンチバイオティック

translation.en: ♪ I might need an anti-psychotic I'm going crazy ♪
translation.ja: 抗精神病薬(アンチサイコティック)が必要 　　　　　イカれそう

translation.en: ♪ NOLA made me And this flow, I got it ♪
translation.ja: この街のせい　知ってる(ガットイット)

translation.en: ♪ I been about it Even if my mental space is crowded ♪
translation.ja: 心は窮屈(クラウディッド) でも分かる

translation.en: ♪ I keep it in because a guilty dog Gonna bark the loudest ♪
translation.ja: やましい犬ほど 　　　デカい(ラウド)鳴き声

translation.en: ♪ My mom's the proudest I know that we can make it out if ♪
translation.ja: ママは偉大(プラウド)　乗り切れる

translation.en: ♪ We made it through a flood I bet we gonna get through the drought ♪
translation.ja: 洪水(フラッド)も干ばつ(ドラウト)も 生き抜ける

translation.en: ♪ I may be little, but in these waters you won't catch me drowning ♪
translation.ja: 私は非力　でも溺れない(ドラウニング)

translation.en: ♪ One day I'll swim in all them Dollar bills I'ma be counting ♪
translation.ja: ドル札の海を泳ぎ 　　　　勘定(カウンティング)してやる

translation.en: You smoked that.
All right.
You're good, damn good.
That's your power.
You take that, you leverage that,
you use your power to take the system down.
All right.
And what's this?
You gotta take four of them.
This says for dogs.
Yeah, well, you a big dog.
translation.ja: あんたは ビッグ･ドッグ(大物)でしょ

translation.en: ♪ 'Bout to make a million For all my, all my, all my ♪
Well, where you going now?
-Remember that guy in the picture? -Yeah.
-Gotta find him. -[door slams]
He took something from me. I gotta get it back.
translation.ja: 奪われたものを取り返す

translation.en: Something or someone?
-We ain't done here. -Give me--
Listen, don't press your luck.
I could navigate for you. You're going to where the dots on the screen is.
translation.ja: 店のモニターで 見た場所よね？

translation.en: I can take you there.
For ten grand.
Why the hell would I pay you $10,000 for anything?
Medical expenses, keeping your ass alive, kidnapping fee.
translation.ja: 治療費に救助費 誘拐の慰謝料も

translation.en: Give me those keys.
I'd say I done you a lot of solids here.
All right.
-Two. -Five.
So, this is your daughter, Tracy.
translation.ja: これ 娘さんの写真よね

translation.en: Yeah.
She look like you.
And you think that guy with the beard took her?
translation.ja: ひげの男がさらったの？

translation.en: You ever hear of Teleios?
No.
What's that?
Defense contractor.
They were the ones who cracked the codes back in the day.
translation.ja: ヤツらは研究を重ね “パワー”を開発した

translation.en: -[camera clicking] -Grabbed a bunch of Rangers,
put 'em all in the room, filled them up with radiation.
translation.ja: 特殊部隊員を集め 放射線漬けにした

translation.en: Messed with their genes.
Tried to turn us into superheroes.
translation.ja: 超人(スーパーヒーロー)に変身させるためだ

translation.en: Why'd they wanna make superheroes?
They didn't. Not really.
'Cause in the real world, the power goes to where it always goes,
translation.ja: こういった特別な力は いつも―

translation.en: to the people that already have it.
translation.ja: 権力者のために作られる

translation.en: Okay. So, what's your power?
translation.ja: そう　あんたのパワーは？

translation.en: I know you took it.
I tried it once.
Damn near killed me, hurt a lot of people.
translation.ja: 死にかけたし 大勢を傷つけた

translation.en: So I said I'm not trying that shit no more.
translation.ja: 二度とやらないと決めた

translation.en: A few years later, Tracy came along.

powers.

[man] Welcome to Project Power.

translation.en: Over the last months, we've been going from city to city

translation.en: in a kind of a... let's call them clinical trials.
translation.ja: この数ヵ月間 いろんな街を回ってきた いわゆる “臨床実験”のためだ

translation.en: Our footprint is small, and we move on quickly to avoid unwanted oversight.

translation.en: Our goal is simple.
The next evolution of the human species.
translation.ja: 人類の新たな進化のためだ

translation.en: That's where you come in.
With your financing, Teleios could become the most powerful company in the world.
translation.ja: 皆さんの融資で 我が社は 世界最強の企業となる

translation.en: What's in it for you?
It's in the headline.
Power.
Power to level the playing field.

translation.en: Or, if you like, destroy it entirely.

translation.en: Power to create chaos.
Power to renegotiate your reality.

translation.en: One day, you won't even need a pill.

translation.en: Pretty words.

translation.en: A healer who can stitch himself up and even regrow what he lost.

translation.en: Hands, feet, eyes, unfathomably complex structures.

translation.en: The octopus camouflages herself against the sea floor.

translation.en: They see in the dark, they dislocate their bones.

translation.en: They turn water into plasma.

translation.en: Evolution has given animals countless abilities we can only dream of.

translation.en: So much power, por favor.

translation.en: All the genetic potential hidden in our DNA just waiting to be released.

translation.en: With your investment, one day, a pill that lasts forever.

translation.en: Stop wishing. Start doing.

translation.en: He's just looking for his daughter.
Everything he's doing, he's doing it for her.

translation.en: -That sound like a bad guy to you? -That's what he told you?

punk?
I'm the punk?

translation.en: Tracy's lab results are fascinating.
